ai-patthana15.9:0.2_0: The Order of the Dhamma: allows unintelligent in the Khadehaka, and constantly preciously:
ai-patthana15.9:0.3_0: Seeing for the sake of seeing,
ai-patthana15.9:1.1_0: it should be given up without cause or reason.
ai-patthana15.9:1.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana15.9:2.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana15.9:3.1_0: it should be given up without a cause or reason for developing without seeing, and with no cause or reason.
ai-patthana15.9:3.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
